Pragmatic Programmers SARL-AU

      Privacy Policy

      Last updated: November 22, 2025

      Pragmatic Programmers SARL-AU respects your privacy and designs every product to collect only the information required to deliver requested features and comply with applicable laws.

      Data Collection

      • We do not collect unnecessary personal data.
      • We never sell personal or behavioral data to third parties.
      • Any analytics or diagnostics are limited to aggregated, non-identifying metrics needed for performance monitoring.

      Data Usage

      Collected information is used strictly for:

      1. Providing requested functionality.
      2. Maintaining security and preventing fraud.
      3. Meeting legal or regulatory obligations.

      Data Sharing

      We share information only with vetted processors who enable our services (e.g., hosting providers) and only under contractual safeguards preventing resale or misuse.

      User Rights

      Users may request access, correction, or deletion of their data by emailing mohamed.boufnichel@prag-prog.com. We respond promptly in accordance with applicable law.

      Contact

      For privacy questions or regulatory inquiries, contact:
